Getting Started:

 This app is designed to help you pick where to eat when you don't know what you want.

 To get started follow the steps below.

 1.	On the main menu press the coin to go to the filter selection page.

 2.	On the filters page, fill out each category to match what you are looking for.

 3.	Enter your zipcode then press the coin to get your restaurant.

 4.	On the next screen it shows you your selection as well as the criteria.

 5.	You can either press the "maps" button to navigate to your restaurant, or re-flip to get a different restaurant.

 Enjoy, and Flip Away!
